mapper.select: select * from keshi_detail where id=#{ksd.id} and Company =#{c}
mapper.delete: delete from keshi_detail where id=#{ksd.id} and Company =#{c}
mapper.select: select teacher_name,course,sum(keshi) as keshi,jine,sum(jine*keshi) as gongzi from keshi_detail where Company =#{c} group by teacher_name,jine order by teacher_name
